name: Darksword: Battle Eternity
abstract: Darksword is an exciting, original non-stop VR action RPG.

detail.app_release_note:
Story Mode Redesign
- Players can now continue the story mode from each Act.
- Act selection and difficulty can be accessed by the mini-map.
Multiplayer Mode Redesign
- Multiplayer content is now accessible in a dedicated multiplayer lobby.
Leaderboard Renewal & Seasonal Reset
- Leaderboard has been restructured into two categories: Story & Co-Op.
- The new leaderboard will be reset on a seasonal basis
Battle Pass
- Players now have access to the battle pass system. Unlocking higher tiers of the pass will require players to play the Co-Op mode.
- In addition to a free standard pass, there is also the option to purchase a premium pass.
Other changes
- Players now have the option to INCREASE movement speed, which can be accessed in the settings menu in the Haven.
- Figure collection reward has been added.
- Players will now be able to easily notice when there is a mail in their mailbox.
New Avatar
- Black Tempest is now available for purchase.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link
